name: pout
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to push the lower lip forward to show you are annoyed, or to push both lips forward in a sexually attractive way: Vanessa always pouts if she doesn't get what she wants. Caroline pouts her lips when she's putting on lipstick. Compare
sulk verb disapproving

sulk noun disapproving
